Container.Name: quassel-web
Container.Overview: Quassel-web(https://github.com/magne4000/quassel-webserver) is a web client for Quassel. Note that a Quassel-Core instance is required, we have a container available here.(https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/quassel-core/)
Container.Changes:
### 2020-06-01 - Rebasing to alpine 3.12.
### 2019-12-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.11.
### 2019-06-28 - Rebasing to alpine 3.10.
### 2019-05-18 - Reconfigure environmental variable setup.
### 2019-04-28 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: will map the container's port 64080 to port 64080 on the host

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: this will store config on the docker host

Config.Name: QUASSEL_CORE
Config.Description: specify the URL or IP address of your Quassel Core instance

Config.Name: QUASSEL_PORT
Config.Description: specify the port of your Quassel Core instance

Config.Name: URL_BASE
Config.Description: Specify a url-base in reverse proxy setups ie. `/quassel`
